About the Covid-19 Estimator

This is a novelty estimator, which hopes to give your ideas of how you can use technology , open source and research to attempt providing advocacy and advisory to any cause , including the COVID-19 pandemic.

How to use the Covid-19 Estimator

Regional Information

  • Region name should one of the continents.
  • Average age on the continent.
  • Average daily income in USDs.
  • Average income population like 0.71 representing 70%.
  • Continental human population.
Estimation Period
  • Period Type can be days, weeks or months.
  • Time to lapse is numeric
Infection Data
  • These are numeric figures partaining to regional infection rates.
